title: Pixel 5, Alarm and clock issue
content: I am using pixel 5,  I have issue with Alarm showing wrong time in notification panel and also on lockscreen. Another issue is, when I usually tap on time on top right corner in notification panel it open clock app, but it's not triggering now. I am not using Tasker and I tried clock app clear cache and uninstall updates, but issues still persist. Please help.
